feed.title: Sault Ste. Marie - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Sault Ste. Marie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:34 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 6:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -0.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -1.9°C
Wind: NNE 23 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending near midnight then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow early this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 before morning. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 later in the morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
